column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My friend and I shared a medium pizza on a lovely (shocking!) Saturday morning ; however
column2: her being asian and I being manorexic
column3: we barely put a dent in it despite our best efforts. For toppings
column5: spicy mix (ghiardani maybe?) and spinach. WOW.  It came out after I had already washed down two delicious bloody marys and was ready to devour.
